Cedant: The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.
Main_Activities: Civil and Hydro-Mechanical Works for power projects, including modification of diversion tunnel into tunnel spillway arrangement, adit to GOC, GOC gate shaft, inlet bellmouth, outlet concrete dyke and energy dissipation arrangement.
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Letter of Acceptance issued in duplicate; return duplicate copy duly signed and stamped by authorized signatory for acknowledgement and confirmation; contact Head of Project, Teesta-V Power Station, NHPC Limited for taking over the work site and to commence Works immediately.
